extendedInfo.description: Type 25% faster than your current keyboard!*** This app is a 30-day free trial of TypeSmart 2.0 Keyboard ***TypeSmart takes the pain out of typing on a mobile device. Going back to fix typos and "damn you auto-correct" interrupts your thought process and groove. With TypeSmart, your ideas just flow onto the screen with the fewest possible keystrokes. Type as fast as you want -- TypeSmart will catch your typos and offer predictions up to two words ahead (and it gets smarter as you type). The most customizations puts the right keys at your fingertips. Toggle a 5-row full keyboard layout with just a swipe. Intelligent typo-correction knows what you really meant to say.Compared to other keyboards, with TypeSmart you will make fewer typos, and go back less often to fix auto-corrects. Even when you do, they will take less time.By the way, TypeSmart works great on your tablet, too. We don't make you buy a special "tablet edition".3 more cool things about TypeSmart:- Type commonly used words or phrases in a single keystroke- Over 20 themes to choose from or use your own photo wallpaper- Translate your messages in real time with Google TranslateLanguages:  - English (US & UK)  - Spanish  - French  - German Layouts:  - QWERTY (English)  - QWERTY (Spanish)  - QWERTY (International)  - AZERTY (French)  - QWERTZ (German)  - T9Compatible devices:- Samsung- HTC- Motorola- LG- Nexus- Plus 99.9% of Android devicesPlease read our privacy policy: http://www.cometapps.com/typesmart-privacy/

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: i was using swift keyboard for a long time.....now I changed because of this app. ...Accurate prediction.... fast typing... no lags.... try to integrate swype functionaliy also ...keep it up!!!
reviews.author: ashwin prabhakar

reviews.title: Potential
reviews.comment: Decent predictions, quite customisable, but needs gesture typing/swipe function. Also fix bug that makes Smiley Anykey popup unresponsive, still have to manually type them in!
reviews.author: Vincent Hardwick

reviews.title: Has potential
reviews.comment: As a current SwiftKey user, this app has potential. I like the personalization options, and LOVE the ability to create custom shortcut abbreviations for frequently used phrases. That said, it is unusable on my tablet until it has a split keyboard layout. I use my tablet many hours each day, almost exclusively in landscape mode. I also have petite hands. Enable a split keyboard and I\'ll gladly give you another shot. Thanks!
reviews.author: Brooke L

reviews.title: great app!
reviews.comment: Love the app. My typing is more accurate. Everything about this app is great except, I think you should add more keyboard themes, and also add more smileys/emoticons.
reviews.author: Helen Baker

reviews.comment: Guys, no Russian dictionary,  thats too bad.  The whole idea is coolest ive ever seen on market...

reviews.title: Great while it works
reviews.comment: About 20% of the time, usually in browsers, you cannot input anything. When it works its great but sadly I cannot randomly lose the ability to input text. This is on a Galaxy Note II using both the stock browser and the Google Chrome browser.
reviews.author: John Behnke

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: I would like to be able to try each keyboard without having to get out each time and go to messaging screen to see what it looks like.  Some keyboards are cramped and I can\'t find a mic key.
reviews.author: jamie robinson

reviews.title: best keyboard I have used
reviews.comment: best keyboard I have ever used.  I would give it more than 5 stars if I could.  I have been searching for an app to do just some of the things this one does.  I don\'t swype,  I just type and this app is perfect. Thank you dev. I an definitely going to buy this app.
reviews.author: Brian Pylant

reviews.title: Galaxy s2
reviews.comment: Before i used go sms and handcent... tried this app and it\'s great so far.. i will recommend this to my friends
reviews.author: Elmer Balatbat

reviews.title: the best ever keypad that i never had.
reviews.comment: This product must continue do so with the put on the best product. Understand for any particular and best using ever.  This thing must get the higher rate when their know to use.  The best ever i had on this keypad.
reviews.author: MUHAMMAD FADHLI SA\'AHARI

reviews.title: Best of all
reviews.comment: This is the best keyboard I ever used
reviews.author: Devadanam gudipati

reviews.title: Very nice prediction
reviews.comment: The predictions are pretty powerful, especially when predicting a whole phrase. Didn\'t they say they also use your sms and gmail to learn your texting style? That is not implemented. However without it supporting more languages, it\'s useless for me as I toggle between 2-3 languages that are not covered by the 6 default ones.
reviews.author: Ross Yes

reviews.title: This is a TOTAL rip off!!!!
reviews.comment: They stole my money. I tried the demo and thought it was descent so I decided to upgrade to full version within the app. It said I was upgraded to the full version but some features are still unavailable. Now when I look in Playstore it tells me I still have the demo installed and would have to pay to get the full version. In-app \"About\" also says I have the demo installed.. I cant get to the cool features. Also, shortcuts don\'t work.
reviews.author: Bernard Christiansen

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: pevumkad aboobacker

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Nice nd easy..
reviews.author: anurag anand

reviews.title: Best keyboard
reviews.comment: Works well.  Exactly what i need

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Can\'t believe i didn\'t down load sooner...

reviews.title: Excellent... for me,  much faster typing.
reviews.comment: Faster,  cleaner,  simpler.

reviews.comment: I Loveeeeee It Best App I Ever Had Hands Down !
